report.title: Not Good Not Bad
report.author: Ryan
report.bodytext: I'm only 13. Just clearing that up one night me and my freind troy bought some herbal xtc I did'ent think it would work so I popped 5 my friend did 2. /n /n 30 min smoked a boul have a slight buzz similar to about 3 cups of coffee. /n /n 1.00 very talkitive finding it hard to stay still just want to talk alot me and my friend took a walk to the store and bought some gum and a soda. /n /n 1.30 very mild closed eye visals mind felling very spacy then a extreme wave of happyness hit me for about 30 sec. /n /n 2.00 wearing off still feal spacy. /n /n 3.00 left with a mild headace. /n /n This was a pretty good buzz for 15.00 but if your looking for a real trip stick with the real deal like I do now.
